channel.title: Any chance of a console port?
channel.description: Just curious if enough support is given might we see it on consoles? I mainly use PS4 right now.

item.title: Any chance of a console port?
item.dc:creator: DBISGOD
item.description:
You would set up a bunch of radial responses, and the there is a keyboard. All the mmo have it, so just a suggestion since I’ve seen a lot of ports recently.
